message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This remarkable item holds immense value to me, but I am confident it would be an exceptional addition to your collection or business. Given its significance and rarity, I am offering you the chance to own it for $1,350,000. This price reflects not only its intrinsic worth but also the opportunity cost of securing such a valuable asset. I trust this offer will meet your expectations and aligns closely with the perceived value of $1,500,000 you attribute to it. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working together.
